items.sentence: Tom never seems to spend much time studying.
Tom never should have gone there by himself.
You had no way of knowing that would happen.
Did Tom know about Mary\'s drinking problem?
Well, Tom, you aren\'t what I was expecting.
Tom certainly can\'t expect to live with us.
We really should sing a little more quietly.
Tom is making a list of what has to be done.
We shouldn\'t have eaten breakfast so early.
We\'ll drive you to the airport if you like.
I want to spend the whole weekend in Boston.
I want to talk to you about the other night.
There\'s got to be an easier way to do that.
How has Boston changed since you were a kid?
How long are you going to be gone this time?
It looks as if it\'s going to be a nice day.
Do you really believe that\'s what happened?
I\'ve heard that Tom asked you to marry him.
I\'ve heard that Tom is now studying French.
I wasn\'t surprised Tom was able to do that.
